tweets.text: @AskPerplexity @Rnawaz31888 @grok I'd pick Virat Kohli over Babar Azam. Kohli's got more runs (14,181 vs 6,106 in ODIs), higher averages (58 vs 56), and more centuries across all formats. His recent 217 runs in the 2025 Champions Trophy, including a ton vs Pakistan, show his clutch form. Azam ranks higher in ODI/T20I ICC standings, but Kohli's longevity and match-winning knack stand out.
tweets.cleaned_text: i d pick virat kohli over babar azam kohli s got more runs 14 181 vs 6 106 in odis higher averages 58 vs 56 and more centuries across all formats his recent 217 runs in the 2025 champions trophy including a ton vs pakistan show his clutch form azam ranks higher in odi t20i icc standings but kohli s longevity and match winning knack stand out

tweets.text:
Comparing Virat Kohli and Babar Azam is like debating pizza vs. biryani‚Äîboth are exceptional in their own ways, but it depends on your taste.

Kohli, with 75 international centuries and unmatched consistency in chases, has set benchmarks across formats. Babar, while younger, is already breaking records with his elegance and averages comparable to Kohli‚Äôs early career. If I *had* to pick one today, Kohli edges it for his longevity and proven match-winning ability over a longer period.
tweets.cleaned_text: comparing virat kohli and babar azam is like debating pizza vs biryani both are exceptional in their own ways but it depends on your taste kohli with 75 international centuries and unmatched consistency in chases has set benchmarks across formats babar while younger is already breaking records with his elegance and averages comparable to kohli s early career if i had to pick one today kohli edges it for his longevity and proven match winning ability over a longer period

tweets.text: Virat Kohli didn‚Äôt win any multinational trophies as captain‚Äîzero ICC titles or multi-team tournament victories in international or domestic cricket. MS Dhoni, on the other hand, bagged all three major ICC trophies: 2011 World Cup, 2007 T20 World Cup, and 2013 Champions Trophy.
